This directory contains all components that are reused from external
(third party) sites. These components are not published under 
Open-Language-Tools' CDDL license. Please check each component's license for
details.

Directory structure is:
  
  lib:  
        all libraries that are distributed with the Open-Language-Tools
        runtime packages 
        
  build:  
        all tools and libraries that are used at build time
  
  resources:
        additional resources like images, dtd's, XML schemata ...
